item.description:
Looks like Trivia is already full, how about come seeing several very influential and involved members of the local arts community talk about various cultural, artistic, and historic roots.

 

Doors open at 7:20, speakers being at 8:20.

 

Cost: Free!

 

never been to a Pecha Kucha (Pe-Cha Ke-Cha, emphasis on the Cha's):

p.p1 {margin: 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px; font: 16.0px Arial; color: #6d5444} td.td1 {width: 548.0px; margin: 0.5px 0.5px 0.5px 0.5px; padding: 5.0px 5.0px 5.0px 5.0px}

The rules are simple. 20x20. Twenty images are shown for exactly 20 seconds each while you talk about the ideas you want to present. So you have 6:40 seconds exactly to tell your entire story. The images are hard-wired to advance at precisely 20 seconds and the mic goes dead at 6:41! It is fun, quick, and crazy. Some are great, some are funny, some are poignant, some are terrible
item.how_to_find_us: I'll try to be identifiable and have a sign, or call me.
item.why: Pecha Kucha speakers are just cool. Theme of the night, 'Roots', has already been announced.
item.name: PechaKucha Providence @ Roots Cafe (downtown - Former Black Rep)
